Posts.Content: I am 4 years post breast augmentation. My right breast has had issues with sensitivity and numbness from nerve damage. Recently the upper outer quadrant of my right breast has started itching and at times the entire your portion itches. It is a deep itch that I can't scratch and no rash is present. My plastic surgeon said it isn't associated with nerve damage or related to the implant stretching out the tissue. Has anyone else had this deep itch I'm talking about?
Posts.Title: Deep itching of breast tissue

Posts.Content: Can anyone tell me what this white spot on my nipple is? I've never been pregnant and an not pregnant now.
Posts.Title: White spot on nipple

Posts.Content: I hate to admit it but my normal GP was out and they assigned a male doctor to me (a young one at that) and I didn't feel comfortable showing him. So I told myself if it hasn't gone away in a couple of weeks when I see my GP again, I'll ask.
Posts.Title: White spot on nipple

Posts.Content: I tried using a warm compress, squeezing it, and even picking at it (I know I probably shouldn't) and it's still there. I got the crusty stuff that I'm guessing is dried normal discharge to come off but not the spot. I'm gonna ask my GP about it tomorrow and keep you posted.
Posts.Title: White spot on nipple

Posts.Content: Yea keep me posted! And I'll let you know what my GP says at the end of the month when I see her. As of now, the spot is still there. Hope your appointment goes well and you get some answers. Thinking of you!
Posts.Title: White spot on nipple

Posts.Content: Would that happen even if I haven't been pregnant?
Posts.Title: White spot on nipple
